meanings.definition: Lower in rank, status, or quality than another or others.
meanings.sent1: The blue car was inferior to the red one.
meanings.sent2: The old phone was inferior to the new model.
meanings.sent3: The inferior pencil tried to outshine the pen.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were inferior to those of her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The inferior quality of the fabric was evident in its rough texture.

meanings.definition: A person lower than another in rank, status, or ability.
meanings.sent1: The intern felt inferior to the experienced employees.
meanings.sent2: He always saw himself as an inferior in the team.
meanings.sent3: The inferior joked about being the 'assistant to the assistant'.
meanings.sent4: She was an inferior in the world of chess grandmasters.
meanings.sent5: The inferior struggled to keep up with the top performers in the competition.
